title: Highest Net Domestic Credit
description: Vietnam had the highest net domestic credit in the world, amounting to 12,108,290,082,835,600 LCU in 2022.

title: Highest Broad Money
description: In 2022, Vietnam recorded the highest broad money globally, totaling 13,109,658,074,994,700 LCU.

title: Most Efficient Tax System
description: Vietnam's taxation system was rated for its operational efficiency with a score of 89.85 in 2024, the highest globally.

title: Highest Exports of Goods and Services
description: In 2023, Vietnam achieved the highest exports of goods and services, valued at 5,429,413,647,635,100 LCU.

title: Highest Imports of Goods and Services
description: Vietnam also had the highest imports of goods and services in 2023, totaling 5,364,601,047,635,100 LCU.

title: Highest External Balance on Goods and Services
description: Vietnam's external balance on goods and services was the highest in the world at 820,797,300,000,000 LCU in 2023.

title: Highest Exports as a Capacity to Import
description: In 2023, Vietnam's exports as a capacity to import reached 5,908,867,522,905,390 LCU, the highest globally.

title: Lowest Discrepancy in GDP Expenditure Estimate
description: Vietnam had the lowest discrepancy in expenditure estimate of GDP, with a value of -350,432,405,884,700 LCU in 2023.
